text: Franco Dori (May 7, 1943 – November 29, 1987) was an Italian professional football player. He was born in Venice and died in Mestre. He played for 4 seasons (34 games, 7 goals) in the Serie A for S.S.C. Venezia, A.S. Roma and A.C.R.
